graph_title: Deaths due to road traffic injuries
indicator_name: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
target_name: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
data_name: Deaths due to road traffic injuries
indicator_definition: The number of deaths attributed to road traffic injuries as defined in Article 2 of the Road Traffic Act
statistics_name: Road traffic accident reports received by the police
computation_calculations: Compiling statistics based on the police road traffic accident investigation reports(Traffic accident statistical graphs)
global_indicator_name: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
source_organisation_1: Road Safety Department, National Police Agency
title: Untitled
